verses.text: Therefore thou shalt \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w charge|strong="H4931"\w*, and his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and his \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w alway|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w know|strong="H3045"\w* ye this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: for \add I speak\add* not with your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* which have not \w known|strong="H3045"\w*, and which have not \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w chastisement|strong="H4148"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, his \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w*, his \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and his stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*,

And his \w miracles|strong="H0226"\w*, and his \w acts|strong="H4639"\w*, which he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and unto all his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*;

And what he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w army|strong="H2428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, unto their \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, and to their \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*; how he made the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* to \w overflow|strong="H6687"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* as they \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* you, and \add how\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w* them unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*;
And what he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto you in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, until ye \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*;

And what he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* and \w Abiram|strong="H0048"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*: how the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w opened|strong="H6475"\w* her \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and swallowed them \w up|strong="H1104"\w*, and their \w households|strong="H1004"\w*, and their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, and all the \w substance|strong="H3351"\w* that \add was\add* in their \w possession|strong="H7272"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:\f + \fr 11.6 \ft substance…: or, living substance which followed them\f*\f + \fr 11.6 \ft was…: Heb. was at their feet\f*

But your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* all the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w acts|strong="H4639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*.

Therefore shall ye \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that ye may be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, and go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* and \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, whither ye \w go|strong="H5674"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it;

And that ye may \w prolong|strong="H0748"\w* \add your\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto them and to their \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that \w floweth|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*.

¶ For the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, whither thou goest \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it, \add is\add* not as the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, from whence ye came \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, where thou \w sowedst|strong="H2232"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, and \w wateredst|strong="H8248"\w* \add it\add* with thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, as a \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* of \w herbs|strong="H3419"\w*:

But the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, whither ye \w go|strong="H5674"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it, \add is\add* a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w hills|strong="H2022"\w* and \w valleys|strong="H1237"\w*, \add and\add* \w drinketh|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*:

A \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* careth \w for|strong="H1875"\w*: the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add are\add* \w always|strong="H8548"\w* upon it, from the \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* of the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* even unto the \w end|strong="H0319"\w* of the \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.  +  r 11.12  t careth…: Heb. seeketh *

¶ And it shall come to pass, if ye shall \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* \w diligently|strong="H8085"\w* unto my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, to \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him with all your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* and with all your \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*,

That I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add you\add* the \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* of your \w land|strong="H0776"\w* in his due \w season|strong="H6256"\w*, the first \w rain|strong="H3138"\w* and the latter \w rain|strong="H4456"\w*, that thou mayest \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* in thy \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, and thy \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and thine \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*.

And I will \w send|strong="H5414"\w* \w grass|strong="H6212"\w* in thy \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* for thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, that thou mayest \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and be \w full|strong="H7646"\w*.\f + \fr 11.15 \ft send: Heb. give\f*

Take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to yourselves, that your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* be not \w deceived|strong="H6601"\w*, and ye turn \w aside|strong="H5493"\w*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* them;

And \add then\add* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* be \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against you, and he shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w* the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, that there be no \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, and that the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* not her \w fruit|strong="H2981"\w*; and \add lest\add* ye \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w* from off the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* you.

¶ Therefore shall ye lay \w up|strong="H7760"\w* these my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* and in your \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w bind|strong="H7194"\w* them for a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* upon your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that they may be as \w frontlets|strong="H2903"\w* between your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

And ye shall \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* them your \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* of them when thou \w sittest|strong="H3427"\w* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and when thou \w walkest|strong="H3212"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, when thou \w liest|strong="H7901"\w* down, and when thou risest \w up|strong="H6965"\w*.
And thou shalt \w write|strong="H3789"\w* them upon the door \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* of thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and upon thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*:

That your \w days|strong="H3117"\w* may be \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, and the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of your \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them, as the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ For if ye shall \w diligently|strong="H8104"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all these \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* you, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them, to \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in all his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and to \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* unto him;

Then will the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* all these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, and ye shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* and \w mightier|strong="H6099"\w* than yourselves.

Every \w place|strong="H4725"\w* whereon the \w soles|strong="H3709"\w* of your \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* shall \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* shall be yours: from the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* and \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, from the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*, even unto the \w uttermost|strong="H0314"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* shall your \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* be.

There shall no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* be able to \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you: \add for\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* the \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of you and the \w dread|strong="H4172"\w* of you \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that ye shall \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* upon, as he hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto you.
¶ \w Behold|strong="H7200"\w*, I \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* a \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* and a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*;

A \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*, if ye \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*:

And a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*, if ye will not \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, but turn \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* out of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, which ye have not \w known|strong="H3045"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath brought thee \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whither thou \w goest|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it, that thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* upon \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gerizim|strong="H1630"\w*, and the \w curse|strong="H7045"\w* upon \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ebal|strong="H5858"\w*.

\add Are\add* they not on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w by|strong="H0310"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* where the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* goeth \w down|strong="H3996"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, which \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w champaign|strong="H6160"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* the \w plains|strong="H0436"\w* of \w Moreh|strong="H4176"\w*?

For ye shall pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* to go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* you, and ye shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it, and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein.

And ye shall \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* which I \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
